message.body: You have clothes in the dryer still? What time did you leave for work?
Nevermind
No I took all my clothes out
Start thinking about what you want for xmas.. gonna try shopping early
Oh gosh haha time is moving too quickly
Lmao

Don't forget we are having our own family xmas this yr which includes me you Steph and marc... we don't expect anything expensive from you but for Steph I can tell you what she wants to make it easier

And Marc is easy. .. he said he doesn't want anything and likes surprised so youxan get him anything. I also figured you can chip in with us on a gift bec we are thinking custom flyers jersey with his name on it or flyers bedding. Both gifts extensive for 1-2 ppl but split 3 ways would be better
Okay that would be great. Cause I'd like to get him something but would have no clue what to get. I like that idea. It would say "Lippi"?
Yea.. and his fav # 10
K sounds good
Text kiara... invite her to a party this sat night
Steph and big amber said so
Haha what party?
Lil amber's bday
80s theme so gotta dress up like 80s ppl... big earrings of bright neon tights etc
Haha I can run it by her but I think she's going home this weekend
Oh.. I was gonna say we can pick her up and drop her off bec we are driving and passing by penn anyway. But where is home?
Haha the poconos
Oh snap... ill be their next weekend!
But Ok let us know
